action.insetText: Any information that is not shown here will be automatically populated when the {{noteType}} is issued.

create.caption: Create {{noteType}}
create.checkIntroText: Check the following information is correct before creating this {{noteType}}.
create.checkAuthorisationText: When created, the {{noteType}} will need to be authorised and issued by a {{noteType}} signatory from your company.
create.checkInsetText: Any information that is not shown here will be automatically populated when the {{noteType}} is issued.
create.helpText: {{noteTypePlural}} can only be issued to packaging waste producers and compliance schemes who have registered with regulators. If the buyer you're looking for is not appearing, check that you have spelled the name correctly and that they are registered with a regulator.
create.notesHint: These notes will appear on the {{noteType}}
create.recipientLabel: Enter who this {{noteType}} will be issued to
create.successNextStepsText: Your {{noteType}} has been created as a draft. You can view and manage it from your registration dashboard.

created.wasteBalanceMessage: Your available waste balance has been updated.
created.issueTextPrefix: You can now issue this {{noteType}} through your

delete.heading: Are you sure you want to delete this {{noteType}}?
delete.warningText: This will permanently delete the {{noteType}}. The tonnage will be returned to your available waste balance.

discard.heading: Are you sure you want to discard this {{noteType}}?
discard.warningText: This will discard the {{noteType}} you are creating. You will need to start again.

errors.recipientRequired: Select who this will be issued to
errors.tonnageWholeNumber: Enter {{noteType}} tonnage as a whole number
errors.tonnageGreaterThanZero: Enter {{noteType}} tonnage as a whole number greater than zero

helpSummary: Can't find the producer or compliance scheme?
insufficientBalanceError: The tonnage you entered exceeds your available waste balance
issueFailedError: We could not issue this PRN or PERN. Try again later.

issued.wasteBalanceMessage: Your waste balance has been updated.
issued.heading: {{noteType}} issued to {{recipient}}

issuedToLabel: Packaging waste producer or compliance scheme

list.noPrns: No PRNs or PERNs have been created yet.
list.balanceHint: This is the balance available for creating new {{noteTypePlural}}
list.cancelHint: If you delete or cancel a {{noteType}}, its tonnage will be added to your available waste balance.

recipientHint: Start typing the name of the packaging waste producer or compliance scheme
tonnageHint: Enter a whole number without decimal places

view.complianceYearText: This {{noteType}} relates to waste accepted for {{wasteAction}} in {{year}} and can count towards {{year}} obligations.
